edu.holycross.shot.greekutils
[Groovy] Class MilesianFraction

java.lang.Object
  edu.holycross.shot.greekutils.MilesianFraction

class MilesianFraction

A class for working with numeric data in the Milesian notational system.

Field Summary
java.lang.String transcription

Transcription as an expression for sum of unit fractions in Arabic numbers.

java.lang.Integer SILENT

Immutable set of consonant characters.

java.lang.Integer debugLevel

BigDecimal fractionValue

Decimal value of the fraction expression.
java.lang.String milesianString

The string in beta code form.
java.util.ArrayList unitFracts

Ordered list of individual unit fractions expressed as integers giving the denominator.
 
Constructor Summary
MilesianFraction(java.lang.String srcString)

Constructor verifies that srcSring contains only valid characters for beta-code representation.
 
Method Summary
BigDecimal getFractionValue()

Formats decimal value of the fraction to the default of 3 significant digits.
BigDecimal getFractionValue(java.lang.Integer places)

Formats decimal value of the fraction to a specified number of significant places.
java.lang.String xscribe()

Constructor verifies that srcString, supplied in an identified system for encoding Greek, contains only valid characters for a MilesianString's underlying beta-code representation.

Constructor Detail

MilesianFraction

MilesianFraction(java.lang.String srcString)
Constructor verifies that srcSring contains only valid characters for beta-code representation.
throws:
Exception if not all characters in betaString are valid.
Parameters:
srcString - Greek string, in beta code.

getFractionValue

BigDecimal getFractionValue(java.lang.Integer places)
Formats decimal value of the fraction to a specified number of significant places.
returns:
A BigDecimal rounded to places number of digits.
throws:
Exception of fractionValue is null
Parameters:
places - Number of places to round to.

xscribe

java.lang.String xscribe()
Constructor verifies that srcString, supplied in an identified system for encoding Greek, contains only valid characters for a MilesianString's underlying beta-code representation.
